channel.title: How do i upload pictures!?
channel.description: Heh, i'm new and i have no idea how to upload pictures. I have some saved on my desktop, but i cant get them on the thing. I put the name inside the little ([img][/img]) but it still doesnt go,k what do i have to put in there!

item.title: How do i upload pictures!?
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

1.) Go to the image you like, press on your keyboard. “Print scrn”
2.) Press “ctrl + v” on the paint page.
3.) Save it as the name you want it to be.
4.) Go to www.tinypic.com
5.) Click browse
6.) Go to where ever you saved the picture
7.) Click upload
8.) Type in the verification code
9.) Wait for the picture to upload then it will open to another page
10.) Copy the " Codes then paste them in the forums.

[font=comic sans ms][size=10pt]Then your done, can you post the image on the forums and then you’ll be able to see the real pictures. Not just the link.[/size][/font]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i upload pictures!?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Upload to an image hosting site, such as www.imageshack.us and get the link of the image and put it in IMG tags.
